TopicTitle: A problem with Wearable KIS Props

Articles.Content: So, everytime i try to equip an item from the Wearable KIS Props mod in 1.7.3, it doesn't show up the item i want to equip. Please help me with this problem, Thank You.

Sorry, I don't have any answer for you myself, but just FYI:  if you have a problem with a particular mod, the best place to ask questions is usually in that mod's release thread (in the "Add-on Releases" subforum), since that's where the author and expert users of the mod generally hang out. 

(Right here where you've posted is fine, too.  It's just a matter of "where are the people who are most likely to have the answer to your question.")
